turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm looking to book a hotel in San Diego from July 10th to July 14th.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that. Dates: July 10th to 14th. Destination: San Diego. Do you have any preferences regarding price range or amenities?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ideally, I'd like something under $200 a night and with a pool. Parking is also essential.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, searching for hotels in San Diego, July 10th-14th, under $200, with a pool and parking. One moment...

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Great, thanks! This last hotel booking experience was a nightmare, I hope this is easier.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand. I've found three hotels that meet your criteria: The Coastal Inn ($180/night), Pacific View Hotel ($195/night) and the San Diego Resort ($210/night - slightly over budget, but included due to other amenities). All have pools and parking. Would you like to know more about any of these?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Tell me more about the Coastal Inn and the Pacific View Hotel. What's the difference, and which one is closer to the Gaslamp Quarter?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: The Coastal Inn is located approximately 3 miles from the Gaslamp Quarter and offers a complimentary breakfast. The Pacific View Hotel is approximately 5 miles away and has ocean views from most rooms. I don't have information regarding which is closer to the Gaslamp Quarter, but the Coastal Inn is closer to the airport.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, that's not very helpful about the Gaslamp Quarter. Ok, never mind. What's the cancellation policy for the Coastal Inn?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: The Coastal Inn has a 24-hour cancellation policy. You can cancel your reservation up to 24 hours before your check-in date without incurring any charges.
